title: What is an  acceptable last item for ADCs?
body:
here is the game in question:

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2054169081/41909791?tab=overview

I bought randuin's despite the fact they were AP oriented because Lucian was super fed.... I only ever really died to Lucian, and the extra armor, hp and crit reduction so i could blow him up...

am I crazy? what should I have gotten?
